#summary &nrarr; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesN N] > &nrarr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&nrArr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21cf/index.htm U+021CF].
  * `&nrarr;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/219b/index.htm U+0219B].
